TextLibrary.Text: Jotun
Jotun, it's time for you and Jarl to end this trouble once and for all.
Jotun, it's time for you and Jarl to end this trouble once and for all.
Jotun, it's time for you and Jarl to end this trouble once and for all.
Jotun, it's time for you and Jarl to end this trouble once and for all.
Trouble? There is no trouble. Jarl steals my things, and I take his stuff as payment. No trouble at all.
Trouble? There is no trouble. Jarl steals my things, and I take his stuff as payment. No trouble at all.
Trouble? There is no trouble. Jarl steals my things, and I take his stuff as payment. No trouble at all.
Trouble? There is no trouble. Jarl steals my things, and I take his stuff as payment. No trouble at all.
You know what I mean. If I can get you both to agree, will you stop?
You know what I mean. If I can get you both to agree, will you stop?
You know what I mean. If I can get you both to agree, will you stop?
You know what I mean. If I can get you both to agree, will you stop?
You cannot trust Jarl. He is treacherous. All Frost Giants are treacherous. Unless...
You cannot trust Jarl. He is treacherous. All Frost Giants are treacherous. Unless...
You cannot trust Jarl. He is treacherous. All Frost Giants are treacherous. Unless...
You cannot trust Jarl. He is treacherous. All Frost Giants are treacherous. Unless...
Unless what?
Unless what?
Unless what?
Unless what?
If he signs an agreement with a quill dipped in Medusa's Blood, it will be binding.
If he signs an agreement with a quill dipped in Medusa's Blood, it will be binding.
If he signs an agreement with a quill dipped in Medusa's Blood, it will be binding.
If he signs an agreement with a quill dipped in Medusa's Blood, it will be binding.
A quill dipped in Medusa's Blood? Who makes these rules up?
A quill dipped in Medusa's Blood? Who makes these rules up?
A quill dipped in Medusa's Blood? Who makes these rules up?
A quill dipped in Medusa's Blood? Who makes these rules up?
It is an ancient law amongst our people. You can find a Medusa outside the village of Weret.
It is an ancient law amongst our people. You can find a Medusa outside the village of Weret.
It is an ancient law amongst our people. You can find a Medusa outside the village of Weret.
It is an ancient law amongst our people. You can find a Medusa outside the village of Weret.
Fine, fine. I'll see you both on neutral ground, down at Giants' Walk, when I'm done.
